meanings.sent1: I heard a loud woof when the dog barked.
meanings.sent2: The woof of the dog echoed through the park.
meanings.sent3: The woof of the dog startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent4: The woof of the dog was like a friendly greeting.
meanings.sent5: The woof of the dog was music to my ears.

meanings.definition: The threads running horizontally in a woven fabric
meanings.sent1: The woof threads give the fabric its strength.
meanings.sent2: She carefully examined the woof of the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The woof threads seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The woof threads held the fabric together like glue.
meanings.sent5: The woof threads were like a sturdy foundation.
